=== Conditions ===
 As *panzer* was developed using C# as the language, therefore, wish to apply for a developer is already familiar with C#, and Visual Studio before then.

=== Become A Developer ===
 If you have a strong logical thinking and creative ability and encoding capabilities, you can become a *panzer* developers, research and development of new features, or maintaining improved features now.

=== Become A Tester ===
 If you love *panzer* and hope that *panzer* to better develop, you can become a tester.

=== Becoming A Documents Officer ===
 Write wiki for *panzer*, provide support information for users. 

=== Application ===
 Please introduce wants the role and briefly, googlecode username send to: m.s.cxc@qq.com, if if there is no reply to you within 48 hours, please understand, possibly because the cause of too much work.
